function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor building design contributing to the spread of contagious diseases through close proximity and shared facilities.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among building occupants, leading to illness and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implementing spatial distancing measures, regular sanitization of shared facilities, and ventilation improvements to reduce indoor transmission.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, touchless fixtures, occupancy monitoring systems, and UV-C disinfection.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality leading to the accumulation of airborne contaminants and pathogens.","Impact":"Higher risk of respiratory infections and airborne diseases among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, and integrating air quality monitoring systems.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, air quality sensors, and natural ventilation strategies.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC contractors, and air quality specialists."},{"Description":"Lack of outdoor access and green spaces leading to poor mental and physical health.","Impact":"Increased stress, reduced social interaction, and higher susceptibility to mental health disorders among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Creating outdoor green spaces, integrating biophilic design elements, and promoting access to natural surroundings.","Technologies":"Biophilic design features, green roof systems, and urban planning strategies for accessible green spaces.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with mental health concerns.","Owner":"Building developers, urban planners, and mental health advocates."}]}
